title: Aoi-Kun Wa Mukimuki Kanojo Wo Kouteishitai
alternative_title: 葵くんはムキムキ彼女を肯定したい
status: 葵くんはムキムキ彼女を肯定したい
description:
Description :
        Aoi is an aspiring stylist who is self-conscious about his short height and cute appearance. His grandmother asks him to help Shinju choose an outfit for her party.  She is a former wrestling athlete who is self-conscious about his tall, muscular appearance. The two are polar opposites in physique and personality, but they end up working together to help Shinju find a husband...
